data.description:
Make Music in VR - This is not a rhythm game!

Immerse yourself in live looping and music production in VR.

- Synced looping with content library, auto time-stretched and pitch-shifted to fit the song.
- Record vocals including mo-cap and replay of your avatar.
- Use your custom Ready Player Me avatar.
- Set of drum kits/one-shots.
- Use Decks to create a seamless mix.
- Full set of audio FX applied per clip or per scene (reverbs, chorus etc). 
- Loop record automation of audio FX parameters and synth parameters.
- Assignable 3D control of FX and synth parameters.
- Loop videos synced to the beat.
- Step sequencer - trigger any item in the world and loop record instruments/drumkits. Edit steps, swing quantize.
- Built in Analog Synth sim and Wavetable synth with >250 Sounds
- Spatial Mixing - create a binaural mix based on clip positions.
- In game camera and screen/mirror.

changelog.change_log: Delay permissions check
Permissions back to init2
Permissions back to init
Different onboarding
AudioFX popup better location
open settings no longer closes scene based world choosers
Changed to on rails tutorial
Fixed step sequencer note stuck on

- v60 Fixed undo load song scale
- Fast Undo/Redo

- Fixed drag cue into scene cue scale, 
- Extra arm button in tutorials removed. 
- Changed first time intro floor material and optimised loading. 
- Built in video instead of YouTube for main help
Links to full version from lite

- Harp hand tracked interaction fixed
- Hand attached menu triggering when system menu up fixed
- Tweaked waveform min height and clipping on synth
Hand occlusion for pass through
- New waveform rendering

- 90 FPS on Quest 3 
- Upped the max resolution
- New onboarding
- Better hand tracked grab
- Fixed decks knobs from load

- 90 FPS on Quest 3 
- Upped the max resolution
- New onboarding
- Better hand tracked grab
Fixed DJ deck grab getting stuck

- Fixed tutorial world
- Fixed hand tracking state against OS v59

- Fixed note stuck on with hand tracking
- Added scale threshold for synth keys, when small finger tips are used for collision when larger, palm collisions are used.
- Disabled hand overlap triggering arrow buttons such as minimize or change to pads/harp etc.
Oculus branch new hand tracking and passthrough
